messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 1541
messages.msgSnippet: What s in the boxes? With
messages.messageBody:
<<<We have 2 weeks of food for the 7 seven of us, one box in the
pantry, one in the car. ...and have updated the first aid kit.>>>

What's in the boxes?
With what did you update the 1st aid kit?
Your preparedness and planning are commendable, Julie.
Thanks.

Aimee

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1541
messages.msgSnippet: Now I am taking just the opposite approach.  We are going about our lives as normal.  I don t let the laws of the United States of
messages.messageBody:
<<with so much going on>>

Now I am taking just the opposite approach. We are going about our lives as
normal. I don't let the laws of the United States of America keep me from
doing what I want, I'm sure not going to let fear do it. My family took
some precautions "just in case" and just continued on with our activities
and plans.

We have 2 weeks of food for the 7 seven of us, one box in the pantry, one in
the car. We take a weapon on my person anytime we go anywhere and have
updated the first aid kit. We have blankets for everybody in the car and
have an emergency plan for where we would meet if it "hit the fan" and we
weren't all together.

Do I think we will need this stuff? no. But it is my job to have
contingency plans because I'm responsible for my kids. There is absolutely
no way to what is going to happen when so I am not going to try.

Julie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1541
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/20/01 7:27:14 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/20/01 7:27:14 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< We didn't fly, but I think passengers and flight crews are much more alert
and are not going to let anyone get away with hi-jacking a plane. Have you
read how several planes have had military escorts, immediate landings,
confetti spilling out of a card and someone reporting it as suspect,
troubled passenger getting restrained by other pax., etc. It seems like
everyone is watching everything that used to go mostly un-noticed.
>>


This is why I do NOT want to fly. maybe I would feel differently if I were
not a mother.

NICKI~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1541
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/20/01 7:27:14 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/20/01 7:27:14 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Worst case scenario might be school accusing the family of educational
neglect, >>

This is exactly what I was thinking they might do. Personally I think the
school should be investigated for this treatment. I thought (according to
articles) that our district was the most progressive in Idaho. How utterly
false. They are progressive according to those stupid tests that give school
incentives.

NICKI~
